videoData.title: What happens when we take humans out of work?
videoData.socialTitle: What happens when we take humans out of work?

nodes.whoTheyAre: Tomer is the founder and CEO of GRONADE, an enterprise optimisation and blockchain growth-hacking company in Sydney. The GRONADE team partners with companies to run experiments on the back of data science reporting, deploying machine intelligence and behavioural experiments to reduce operating expenses, amplify profit and capitalise on future-of-work opportunities. A self-described “experimental datapreneur,” Garzberg has worked across continents for over a decade, blending the worlds of data, AI, behaviors and creativity. He is an IBM Global Entrepreneur and a Westpac Business of Tomorrow recipient.

videoData.description: AI will take our jobs—and that is a good thing, argues Tomer Garzberg. He tells how intelligent robots are already supplanting people, freeing us to imagine new roles for ourselves, and also surveys endeavors that are likely to remain human for some time to come.
videoData.socialDescription: AI will take our jobs—and that is a good thing, argues Tomer Garzberg. He tells how intelligent robots are already supplanting people, freeing us to imagine new roles for ourselves, and also surveys endeavors that are likely to remain human for some time to come.
